leet{
    Version{"2.0.92.29"}
    boundaries{
        word:process(dependency){"word_POSIX.brk"}
    }
    exceptions{
        SentenceBreak:array{
            "Maj.",
            "Mr.",
            "Lt.Cdr.",
            "Pvt.",
            "Lt.",
            "Hon.B.A.",
            "exec.",
            "Md.",
            "Capt.",
            "Col.",
            "Prof.",
            "Rev.",
            "Ph.D.",
            "pp.",
            "Mrs.",
            "PP.",
            "Ms.",
            "vs.",
            "Sgt.",
            "A.D.",
            "Fri.",
            "a.m.",
            "Mt.",
        }
    }
}
